alert.note: Alert for Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 1:40PM EST until January 06 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of a coating to 2 inches, and ice accumulations of up to one-tenth of an inch, with the highest amounts most likely near the Pennsylvania border. * WHERE...Northern Baltimore, Northwest Montgomery, Northwest Howard, and Northwest Harford Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow and sleet between 10 AM and 1 PM. Precipitation will mix with and change to freezing rain between 1 PM and 3 PM, then end during the mid evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery
